The Battle of San Jacinto refers to at least two paintings by Henry Arthur McArdle depicting the Battle of San Jacinto. One version, measuring approximately  by , is installed in the Texas Senate chamber of the Texas State Capitol in Austin, Texas. A smaller oil painting, measuring  by , was discovered in late 2009; this version is not a copy or study for the painting in the capitol building.
File:Austin, Texas (2018) - 086.jpg|Detail of the frame in the Texas State Capitol
